Optimized test efficiency by automating the parameter setup for different tests in the Ballistic Impact Rig using a machine learning model, improving accuracy, and reducing preparation time by approximately 20%#Delivered and analyzed high-quality test results in multiple test campaigns, including compressor mapping, deep stall studies, and bird impact testing at engine level.#Solved instrumentation challenges by designing, manufacturing and attaching different extensions for two test rigs to optimize sensors positioning#Enhanced data collection and analysis by implementing advanced blade vibration monitoring and aerodynamic instrumentation.#Created comprehensive documentation, adhered to strict EASA-regulated processes, and maintained a creative problem-solving approach during troubleshooting of complex testing scenarios.

extracurr.universityName: Author - Prime Numbers, The Holy Grail of Mathematics
extracurr.GPA: Authored and independently published Prime Numbers, The Holy Grail of Mathematics (ISBN 9798555779014)
extracurr.universityPara1: This project aims to create a simplified and a comprehensive guide to prime numbers and their properties. The book covers the history of prime numbers, their distribution, and their applications in cryptography, number theory, and computer science.
